answers.answer: Hello!What are the other associated symtoms? Do you also have itching in this area? Dark discoloration in the groin can usually be a sign that a person is overweight and has insulin resistance .This condition is called acanthosis nigrans.There are several health risks associated with these conditions like liver disease, heart disease, stroke, diabetes and cancers. Only an external examination can confirm the diagnosis. Other tests like a biopsy, blood tests, x-rays or other tests may be needed. Do keep us posted on how you are doing.Take care and regards!
